p: Tragia involucata L. leave was coarsely powdered. About 100 gm of powdered material was macerated with all solvents (Methanol, Ethyl Acetate and n-Hexane) as 1:4 ratio (W/V) at room temperature for 7 days period with occasional shaking and stirring. To get a viscous mass, whole mixture was filtered through a Whatman number 1 filter paper and then was filtrated by using a rotary evaporator (Bibby RE200, Sterlin Ltd, UK).
